attributes.action: End Illegal Israeli settlements and annexation of Jerusalem
attributes.additional_details:
That HM government in the interests of world peace should challenge the US veto of the recent unanimous Security Council condemnation of illegal settlement building and annexation of Jerusalem by the Israeli government.
The use of the veto by the US 41 times in favour of Israel and against Palestine is undemocratic.
The settlements are illegal in international law as is the unilateral annexation of Jerusalem by Israel which involves demolition of Palestinian homes, expulsion and building on occupied land inbreach of Article 4 of the Geneva Convention.
